alert.note: Alert for Bay; Calhoun; Franklin; Gadsden; Gulf; Jackson; Jefferson; Leon; Liberty; Madison; Taylor; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued April 05 at 4:20PM EDT until April 05 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 97 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 7 PM EDT /6 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 12 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA FRANKLIN GADSDEN JEFFERSON LEON LIBERTY MADISON TAYLOR WAKULLA IN PANHANDLE FLORIDA BAY CALHOUN GULF JACKSON THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABE SPRINGS, ADAMS BEACH, ALMA, APALACHICOLA, ATHENA, BAY CITY, BENNETT, BETHEL, BEVERLY, BLOUNTSTOWN, BLUE SPRINGS, BOYD, BRADFORDVILLE, BROWNTOWN, BUCELL JUNCTION, BUCK SIDING, CABBAGE GROVE, CAIRO, CALLAWAY, CAPITOLA, CAPPS, CARBUR, CARRABELLE, CASA BLANCO, CHAIRES, CHAIRES CROSSROADS, CHATTAHOOCHEE, CHERRY LAKE, CLARKSVILLE, DALKEITH, DILLS, DRIFTON, DURHAM, ECONFINA, FESTUS, FORT GADSDEN, FRINK, GRACEVILLE, HANSON, HARDIN HEIGHTS, HILLIARDVILLE, HONEYVILLE, HOPEWELL, HOWARD CREEK, JARROTT, KILLEARN ESTATES, KILLEARN LAKES, LITTMAN, LOVETT, LYNN HAVEN, MACLAY STATE GARDENS, MADISON, MALONE, MARIANNA, MARYSVILLE, MONTICELLO, NIXON, OAK GROVE, ODENA, PANAMA CITY, PERRY, PINETTA, PORT ST. JOE, QUINCY, QUINCY AIRPORT, RICHTER CROSSROADS, SANTA CLARA, SCOTTS FERRY, SIMSVILLE, SNEADS, SOPCHOPPY, ST. MARKS, SWEETWATER, TALLAHASSEE, TILTON, WAKULLA SPRINGS, WETUMPKA, WEWAHITCHKA, AND WHITE CITY.
